channel.title: [PI] Webclient Freeze
channel.description:
Ok so my problem is i have a jar file it works perfect launching from desktop but when i put it in html page and launch it it loads up perfectly fine then when you log in it freezes to a black screen i have changed to different html code for the jar file and that doesnt help. On the server cmd it shows that my player connects.
Really need some help.

item.title: [PI] Webclient Freeze
item.dc:creator: @Twist3dd Twist3dd
item.description:
@Twist3dd wrote:

java is good its using the same cache and there is no error if there was i would have posted.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Webclient Freeze
item.dc:creator: @artem543 artem543
item.description:
@artem543 wrote:

It’s some reading issues while initializing the web client. Please view the applet’s command prompt And post the error.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Webclient Freeze
item.dc:creator: @RUNE-PK RUNE-PK
item.description:
@RUNE-PK wrote:

Are you using the same cache?
It could be a cache problem.
If not, try reinstalling your current version or an updated version of Java. http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk7-downloads-1880260.html

Read full topic
